# Repository Topics

Add these topics ONE AT A TIME in the GitHub web interface:

## Step-by-Step Instructions:

1. Go to: https://github.com/LABOSO123/Femora
2. Click the **⚙️ gear icon** next to "About" section
3. In the "Topics" field, add topics **ONE BY ONE** (press Enter after each):
   - Type a topic
   - Press Enter
   - Type the next topic
   - Press Enter
   - Repeat...

## Valid Topics List (Copy one at a time):

```
women-health
menstrual-cycle
period-tracker
fertility-tracker
reproductive-health
cycle-tracking
javascript
html5
css3
vanilla-javascript
calendar
symptom-tracker
contraceptive-tracker
menopause
health-app
web-app
pwa
kenya
healthcare
```

## Quick Copy-Paste (Add these individually):

**Health & Wellness:**
- women-health
- menstrual-cycle
- period-tracker
- fertility-tracker
- reproductive-health
- cycle-tracking
- healthcare

**Technology:**
- javascript

- calendar
- symptom-tracker
- contraceptive-tracker
- menopause
- health-app

**Regional:**
- kenya

## Alternative: Use GitHub API Scripts

If adding manually is tedious, use the provided scripts:
- `add-topics.ps1` (Windows PowerShell)
- `add-topics.sh` (Linux/Mac Bash)

Both require a GitHub Personal Access Token with `repo` scope.
